entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 this morning then rising. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
